Welcome to Hamiltonian_Solver’s documentation!¶

Homework8¶

Need to solve for equation 7 of Crossing Classified and Corrected Fewest Switches Surface Hopping paper.

H = E(ax[orbital]) ([orbital]+ E(-t[orbaital](k) (k+1 + k +1 [orbital)] + E((1/2)K(x^2)+m(v^2)) molecule is k x is a vibrational degree of freedom v is velocity K is force constant amu/Pa*s^2 m is mass amu t is hopping amplitude a is local electron phonon coupling (cm)^-1/(angstroms) L is length in angstroms omega is Phonon frequency g is Electron-phonon coupling strength N is number of electrons

class Homework8.homework8.problemsolving[source]¶

This class solves the hamiltonian.

energies(N, omega1)[source]¶

This function solves the energies. :param c[i]: Fermion opperator :type c[i]: matrix :param b[i]: Phonon opperator :type b[i]: matrix :param omega1: Frequency :type omega1: float

Returns:

The kenetic energy V (matrix): The potential energy

Return type:

K (matrix)

finishedhamil(V)[source]¶

Solves the Hamiltonian :param K: The kenetic energy :type K: matrix :param V: The potential energy :type V: matrix

Returns:

The hamiltonian solution

Return type:

H (matrix)

Fermion opperator b (matrix): Phonon opperator N (float): number of electrons omega1 (float): Frequency
